alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 11:37AM MDT until April 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 55 mph, with frequent gusts up to 75 mph. Isolated gusts approaching 90 mph are possible. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front, including all of Glacier County. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow may also cause periods of near whiteout conditions at and above mountain pass level.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
